title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
e. Look for Mayrin and bring her the wand. Interacting with her will give you the following dialogue options.

I found a wand - I think I can resurrect your husband. Are you all right? You could just leave him here. Whining won't het you there any faster. Stand with her in silence. Leave her to mourn.

Choosing dialogue 1 will shock Mayrina and she begs you to resurrect him. This will give you the following dialogue options.

Point the wand towards the coffin. Snap the wand in two.
